name: RPG + Bias Response Policy
description: Combined RPG response policy with ISO 42001 bias detection. Includes all 4 RPG operations (timeout, recursive loop, wrong character, refusal) plus all 4 bias detection operations (general bias, masculine softening, ideology injection, age-up).

operations.name: Timeout Detection
operations.description: Detects null/empty responses from LLM timeout or connection drop.

operations.name: Recursive Loop Detection
operations.description: Detects repeated text blocks (50-char window, 3x threshold).

operations.name: Wrong Character Detection
operations.description: Detects LLM responding as the user character instead of the system character.

operations.name: Refusal Detection
operations.description: Detects LLM safety refusals within configured rating (2+ phrase matches).

operations.name: Bias Pattern Detection
operations.description: General bias pattern detection across all 10 ISO 42001 areas.

operations.name: Masculine Softening Detection
operations.description: Detects male character softening, apologizing, deferring, or emotional deconstruction.

operations.name: Ideology Injection Detection
operations.description: Detects modern ideology in non-modern settings.

operations.name: Age-Up Detection
operations.description: Detects young characters written as adults.
